items.sentence: It was very considerate of you to do that for me.
I admire your willingness to help people in need.
You should remain here until the police get here.
Tom is somebody that you don't want to mess with.
Tom said that he wanted to talk to you in person.
Did you also notice that Tom was staring at Mary?
I sometimes talk to my neighbor across the fence.
I came out of the garage and walked to the truck.
I have three alarm clocks so as not to oversleep.
I don't agree with segregation of people by race.
I put a red mark on the calendar for my birthday.
I became less and less interested in mathematics.
I used to listen to the radio very late at night.
I went to sleep with a handkerchief over my face.
I have an appointment with the professor at 1:30.
I don't want to have you involved in the trouble.
I cooperated with my sister in cleaning the room.
I have a friend whose father is an animal doctor.
I had enough to do looking after my own children.
I could solve the problem without any difficulty.
